-- Pacifix / Crossroads --

Crossroads smiles back, finding that he likes t=
his large bot's 
manner of things, "And he can rhyme as well! I'll agree wi=
th you on 
that one. Preds and Decepticons are cowardly at best." He transf=
orms 
into his vehicle mode for Skullhammer, a red, black and blue sleek 
m=
otorcycle with a red seat, black side armour, and blue fenders. His 
blue A=
utobot symbols gleam on both sides of his side armour. He 
stays in motorcy=
cle mode for a few seconds, then his frame folds 
back into his robot mode,=
 and he lands on his feet.

"I also transform into a sword and a shield, bu=
t there's no point in 
showing off even more." He says as he continues to f=
ollow Pacifix.

Pacifix enters the control room, and motions for the group =
to take a 
seat. He himself sits down in the control chair in the south sid=
e of 
the room. "Welcome, Skullhammer, to the Autobot base. The question 
o=
f the day is whether you intend to join us, or perhaps there was 
another p=
urpose for your arrival. We would be honoured to have you 
join us, but we =
would also do all in our power to help you if you 
choose not to stay." He =
looks at Crossroads who has taken a seat at 
the scanners on the far left s=
ide, and then back to Skullhammer, his 
eyes crossing the oval shaped grey =
and blue room, taking in the 
newer technology that went into the ship; the=
 weapons systems, then 
light shielding (invisibility), long range to short=
 range high 
detail scanners, and the engine controls, which were destroyed=
 
beyond hopes of repair from their crash.

ooC: Just trying to give you an=
 idea of the base. =3D)

uch like Lioconvoy features the
